schema_description: Contains submitted decisions from assortment management platform.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Primary Key for recommendation AMP decision table.

fields.name: item_movement_recommendation_id
fields.description: Primary key from snowflake table recommendations_on_item_movmement.

fields.name: consolidated_inventory_id
fields.description: Primary key from snowflake table consolidated inventory.

fields.name: retailer
fields.description: The code name given to the retailer.

fields.name: mfc_id
fields.description: The unique id of the mfc in the context of the retailer.

fields.name: decision_status
fields.description: This is the decision it can be: approved,skip, exclude,flag_for_review.

fields.name: decision_state
fields.description: Signifies ui actions like checked, unchecked and submitted: draft, submitted, undecided, abandoned.

fields.name: reason_codes
fields.description: Used when decision status is not approved. The csv format supports multiple values.

fields.name: created_by_user
fields.description: User that made the decision with the exception of pre-approvals which are systemuser@takeoff.com.

fields.name: pre_approved
fields.description: These are generated by AMP using the top 25 percent of the recommendation details by rank.
